Player History
Released by Milwaukee on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 6th round, 105th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1969...
Drafted in 3rd round, 51st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1972...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 2/6/1972 (Going to CHC: P T. Underwood. Going to NYY: 3B D. Chalk)...
Injured on 9/7/1972 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/12/1975 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/3/1978 with a Bruised Heel, out for 2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/24/1979, off Ken Forsch (BAL)...
Injured on 4/8/1980 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/14/1980 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 8/13/1983, off Tom House (OAK)...
Injured on 9/10/1984 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Boston in 1987...
Injured on 6/5/1989 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/28/1991, off John Martin (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/16/1991, off Greg Swindell (CHW)...
